text: EXCLUSIVE: Club doctors sent email to Premier League on Mon listing around 100 concerns/questions they want addressing on Return to Training protocol, most notably “How can we ‘approve’ guidelines that still carry risk of death?”. Full story @TheAthleticUK https://t.co/KothoKLL1X
